short_summary: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), Real Property Branch , requires a contractor to carry out repairs and retrofitting work of the shower drains at the inmate living quarters in the Collins Bay Institution Maximum Security facility.
description: Please visit the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at the link provided for complete details.
full_summary:
=================================
**Collins Bay Institution Shower Drain Retrofit - Phase 1 ITQ**
----------------------------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Number
WS4363736850

### Publication Date
2024-01-10

### Tender Closing Date
**2024-01-25T14:00:00 EST**

### NOTICE
Please note that the tender closing date has been amended. All interested suppliers must submit their bids and supporting documentation by 14:00 EST on the specified closing date to be considered responsive.

### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC), Real Property Branch, is seeking a qualified contractor to undertake repairs and retrofitting work on shower drains at the Collins Bay Institution Maximum Security facility. The successful contractor will be required to complete the work within sixty (60) weeks from the date of acceptance of the offer.

**Project Overview**

This tender announcement marks the first phase (Phase One) of a two-phase process. The evaluation of qualifications for all interested suppliers will be conducted during this phase, followed by an invitation for qualified suppliers to submit a bid on the project, based on the specifications and drawings provided.

### Selection Criteria

The selection of a qualified contractor will be based on the lowest price for the work being offered.

### Additional Information

A detailed description of the project, including specifications and drawings, can be found on the SAP Ariba Discovery posting at:

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18477814?extsite=MTg0Nzc4MTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Carter Gooch
* Email: [carter.gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:carter.gooch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Important Dates

* Publication Date: January 10, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024, 14:00 EST
* Expected Contract Start Date: To be determined
* Expected Contract End Date: To be determined

### Attachment
None

Note that, I have taken excerpted and restructured the text to bring out the importrant points explicitly without compromising any essential details. The equivalent structure of UNSPSC Classification,
